title: LDS MORMON ALL BYU SPEECHES 1949-2013
description:
This is a mirror (offline copy) of speeches.byu.com generated using HTTrack software

It contains about 10,000 BYU speeches in HTML format (all of them)

HOW TO USE: Copy the entire folder to your kindle fire or other tablet.  Access index.html with web browswer.  You now have an offline copy of the entire site for reading.

If you want to convert to .mobi or epub good luck, there are too many to manage.
